summary: This document is an email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Paul Morris discussing account information and asset breakdowns related to Deutsche Bank. It includes a forwarded message from Harry Beller, indicating a discussion about financial assets.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, who is forwarding information regarding asset accounts to Paul Morris.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is the recipient of the email from Amanda Kirby, discussing the asset breakdown.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is the sender of the original message that Amanda Kirby forwarded, providing details about account information.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is an associate who communicates with Paul Morris regarding financial matters at Deutsche Bank.
Amanda Kirby forwards information from Harry Beller, indicating a professional relationship within Deutsche Bank.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, USA 10154-0004
keyFacts: The email was sent on September 12, 2013, at 2:36 PM.
Amanda Kirby is discussing asset accounts with Paul Morris.
Harry Beller provided a breakdown of assets in the accounts, which was forwarded to Paul Morris.
